queries.query: small fey creature with spellcasting abilities that can fly
queries.variant: small fey that can fly and has spells

queries.query: agile and cunning fey known for evasion and magical resistance
queries.variant: cunning and agile fey with magic resistance and evasion

queries.query: fast moving fey that can become invisible and use arrows
queries.variant: fey that moves quickly, can turn invisible and uses arrows

queries.query: creature with high Dexterity and low Strength that specializes in Acrobatics
queries.variant: fey with low strength and high Dexterity that excels at Acrobatics

queries.query: neutral evil fey that can manipulate foes with spells like Charm Person
queries.variant: neutral evil fey capable of using spells like Charm Person to control enemies
